summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nyaay Sathi legal-tech platform. Backend API tests (22/22 passed). Frontend UI tests verified lawyer dashboard dark theme, user dashboard light theme, and End-to-End Encrypted labels on messaging/network features.

ui_bugs.issue: Floating point precision issue in lawyer rating display - shows '4.800000000000001' instead of '4.8'
ui_bugs.selector: Consultation tab - Top Rated Lawyers section
ui_bugs.fix_suggestion: Use toFixed(1) on the rating calculation: {(4.9 - idx * 0.1).toFixed(1)}

action_items: Fix floating point precision in UserDashboard.js line 426 - use toFixed(1) for rating display
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies in LawFirmDashboard.js, LawyerDashboard.js, UserDashboard.js - consider adding fetchData to dependency arrays or using useCallback
seed_data_creation: Created test users during API testing with unique emails
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Lawyer dashboard has consistent dark theme across all tabs (Dashboard, Cases, Calendar, Messages, Documents, Network, Earnings). User dashboard has light theme with white sidebar. End-to-End Encrypted labels visible on Lawyer Messages, Documents, and Network tabs. All data is India-specific with 2026 dates. Minor floating point bug in rating display on Consultation tab.

features_verified.lawyer_dashboard_dark_theme: PASS - All tabs have consistent dark theme (slate-950 background)
features_verified.lawyer_cases_tab: PASS - Dark theme with stats (124 Total, 12 Active, 8 Pending, 104 Archived) and case table
features_verified.lawyer_documents_tab: PASS - Dark theme with End-to-End Encrypted label, document list with 2026 dates
features_verified.lawyer_network_tab: PASS - Dark theme with End-to-End Encrypted label, lawyer discussions
features_verified.lawyer_earnings_tab: PASS - Dark theme with billing history (â‚¹2,56,789.50 Total Revenue)
features_verified.lawyer_messages_tab: PASS - Dark theme with End-to-End Encrypted label
features_verified.user_dashboard_light_theme: PASS - White sidebar, light content area with blue/black/green text
features_verified.user_consultation_tab: PASS - Light theme with lawyer cards (minor rating display bug)
features_verified.user_chatbot_tab: PASS - Light theme with AI assistant interface
features_verified.user_documents_tab: PASS - Light theme with document upload interface
features_verified.backend_auth_api: PASS - /api/auth/login works for both lawyer and client types
